ControlledConcept.gml:description: all instances of the observed entity have this property value Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:always
ControlledConcept.name: always

ControlledConcept.gml:description: reported property value is commonly observered Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:common
ControlledConcept.name: common

ControlledConcept.gml:description: reported property value is never observed Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:never
ControlledConcept.name: never

ControlledConcept.gml:description: reported property value is observed occasionally Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:sometimes
ControlledConcept.name: sometimes

ControlledConcept.gml:description: reported property value is rarely observed. Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:rare
ControlledConcept.name: rare

ControlledConcept.gml:description: property value is not applicable to this feature instance. Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:nil_inapplicable
ControlledConcept.name: nil:inapplicable

ControlledConcept.gml:description: property value is withheld; a value may be known but may not be reported. Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:nil_withheld
ControlledConcept.name: nil:withheld

ControlledConcept.gml:description: property value is missing, a value may be known Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:nil_missing
ControlledConcept.name: nil:missing

ControlledConcept.gml:description: property value is unknown Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:nil_unknown
ControlledConcept.name: nil:unknown

ControlledConcept.gml:description: reported property value is the observered value Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:equalTo
ControlledConcept.name: equalTo

ControlledConcept.gml:description: reported property value is lower bound Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:greaterThan
ControlledConcept.name: greaterThan

ControlledConcept.gml:description: reported property value is upper bound Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:lessThan
ControlledConcept.name: lessThan

ControlledConcept.gml:description: specified value is approximate Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:approximate
ControlledConcept.name: approximate

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Root means square, or the square root of the mean of the squares of a collection of measured values. Source: GeoSciML UML model; http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quadratic_mean
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:quadratic_mean
ControlledConcept.name: quadratic mean

ControlledConcept.gml:description: The reciprocal of the arithmetic mean of the reciprocals of a collection of measured values. Source: GeoSciML UML model; http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harmonic_mean
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:harmonic_mean
ControlledConcept.name: harmonic mean

ControlledConcept.gml:description: The geometric mean of a collection of positive data is defined as the nth root of the product of all the members of the data set, where n is the number of members. Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:geometric_mean
ControlledConcept.name: geometric mean

ControlledConcept.gml:description: The average of a set of numbers. Found by adding all the numbers in a set and dividing the sum by the number of entries. Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:arithmetic_mean
ControlledConcept.name: arithmetic mean

ControlledConcept.gml:description: The reported property value occurs most often in a set of data. (There may be more than one mode.) Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:mode
ControlledConcept.name: mode

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Half of the values in a collection of measured values for the property are greater than the reported value and half are less than the reported value. Source: GeoSciML UML model; definition this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:ValueQualifier:200811:median
ControlledConcept.name: median
